title: Alexander Rossi (IndyCar driver, ALMS, Baja1000, Bathurst)
description:
Alexander Rossi (@alexanderrossi) is an American professional racing driver. He shocked the world when he won the Indy 500 as a rookie, and has driving interests that extend far beyond the famous oval. He's talks to us about racing in Baja, Bathurst, Daytona and how he almost became an F1 driver. He currently competes full-time in the IndyCar Series, driving the No. 27 Honda for Andretti Autosport.

https://alexanderrossi.com/
